sentences.sContent: High spiking fever with chills is suggestive of a complicating pylephlebitis.
sentences.sContent_eng: High spiking fever with chills is suggestive of a complicating pylephlebitis.
sentences.sCn: 伴有寒战的高热，暗示合并门静脉炎。

sentences.sContent: In addition, "small forest (omit 27 words)" sexually suggestive language was also netizen criticism.
sentences.sContent_eng: In addition, "small forest (omit 27 words)" sexually suggestive language was also netizen criticism.
sentences.sCn: 此外，“小树林（省略27个字）”等性暗示语言也遭到网友批判。

sentences.sContent: A double promise revealed by some suggestive event of both immediate or literal and sentimental significance.
sentences.sContent_eng: A double promise revealed by some suggestive event of both immediate or literal and sentimental significance.
sentences.sCn: 一些直接的或间接的重要心理暗示揭示了双重的允诺。
